design_style.mood: clean, bright, confident with moments of high-contrast drama
visual_metaphors: large hero modules with product imagery

page_patterns: global sticky top navigation followed by long scrolling page
hero section with large product image and primary heading
alternating light and dark feature bands
rows of cards for products and accessories
spec comparison sections with multi-column tables
footer with dense legal text and multi-column link lists

primary.description: vivid cool blue used for key actions and interactive highlights

primary_variant.description: warm orange accent used in gradients and promotional highlights

background.description: soft neutral gray used as page backdrop

surface.description: pure white used for cards, navigation, and most content blocks

surface_alt.description: very dark slate used for spotlight sections with inverted text

error.description: vivid red reserved for error states and critical messaging

success.description: bright green for success confirmations and positive states

warning.description: strong yellow used sparingly for warnings or limited-time notices

info.description: cool violet used for informational highlights and secondary CTAs

usage_rules: primary color is reserved mainly for primary CTAs, interactive links, and key sliders
background is a soft gray while most content is placed on white surfaces to create subtle depth
dark surface sections are used to create spotlight zones with bright product imagery and light text
gradients blend warm and cool colors (e.g., orange to blue) for hero backgrounds and promotional banners
dividers use a very light neutral gray line for section separation without adding heavy borders
status colors (error, success, warning) are used minimally and mostly in inline messaging, not large components

font_family_style.primary: humanist system sans-serif with slightly rounded terminals

text_treatments: hero headings are sentence case with tight tracking and high contrast against the background
eyebrow labels above headings are all caps or small caps with increased letter-spacing
button labels are title case with medium weight and subtle letter-spacing
link text often uses the primary color with no underline until hover/focus
long legal copy uses smaller size and tighter leading, in muted gray color

buttons.icon_use: icons are used sparingly, mostly for play controls or arrows; when present they are aligned to the right of the label with small spacing

states.default: filled buttons use primary color with white text; outlined buttons use transparent background with primary border and text
states.hover: slightly darker background for filled buttons, subtle scale-up (~1.02), and stronger shadow; outlined buttons gain a soft tinted background
states.active: briefly darker fill and slightly compressed scale (~0.98) with reduced shadow
states.focus: primary-colored ring or soft glow around button
states.disabled: lower opacity and muted colors with no hover elevation

inputs.style: rounded rectangular fields with soft neutral outline and white surface
inputs.border_style: 1px solid light gray with subtle inner shadow removed
inputs.focus_state: outline color switches to primary and a faint glow or 1px outer ring appears
inputs.label_placement: labels are placed above the input in smaller text or inside as placeholder for search fields
inputs.helper_text: optional small text below the field in muted gray for hints or validation messages

cards.shadow: soft, wide drop shadow with low opacity to create floating effect
cards.border: typically borderless; sometimes a faint 1px line around cards on light backgrounds
header_patterns: top-aligned product image with text below
text block with small eyebrow label, heading, and short body
badge or label in the upper-left corner for status like 'new'
footer_patterns: primary and secondary CTAs stacked or inline
dot-based carousel indicators for multi-slide modules

navigation.layout: logo or icon on the left, horizontal list of primary categories in the center or left, utility icons (search, bag, profile) on the right
navigation.background: translucent or solid white surface with slight blur when over content
navigation.item_style: compact text links with medium weight and generous horizontal spacing
navigation.hover_behavior: text color changes to primary or dark, and in some cases a thin underline or pill-shaped background appears
navigation.active_state: stronger text color and persistent underline or pill
navigation.mobile_behavior: navigation collapses into a menu icon and panel, with items stacked vertically

typical_use: filter or category tags in carousels

colors.background: tinted version of primary or gradient highlight
colors.text: high-contrast dark or white depending on background

hero_product_module.description: large section combining a central product image, primary heading, short body text, and 1–2 CTAs
hero_product_module.layout: content usually centered on desktop; on other sections text is left-aligned with product imagery offset to one side

feature_band.description: full-width band highlighting a specific capability, sometimes with darker background and high-contrast imagery
feature_band.pattern: heading, supporting body text, and visual asset (image or video frame) aligned on grid

spec_comparison_table.description: multi-column comparison for different product variants
spec_comparison_table.style: light grid lines, alternating row backgrounds, small text, and checkmarks or values aligned vertically

product_carousel.description: row of cards showcasing multiple related products or accessories
product_carousel.behavior: horizontal scrolling on smaller viewports and paginated cards with dots or arrows on larger screens

promo_banner.description: gradient-backed highlight panel for seasonal offers or campaigns
promo_banner.style: rounded rectangles with large illustration or product imagery and bold headings

shadows.button_shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.22) on hover and smaller at rest
shadows.hero_image_shadow: broader, softer shadow to make hardware imagery appear floating

border_usage: minimal use of borders; preference for separation via spacing and background color shifts
thin neutral dividers used to segment dense content zones such as footers or spec tables
rounded surfaces and shadows provide hierarchy instead of heavy outlines
when_elevation_is_applied: primary interactive components (cards, CTAs) gain a subtle lift or stronger shadow on hover
hero imagery floats above the background using pronounced but soft shadows
menus and overlays use higher elevation with blur to separate them from the main page

icon_style.stroke: mostly filled or duotone glyphs with simple geometry and slightly rounded corners
icon_style.size_relative_to_text: around 1.1–1.3x the height of body text
icon_style.usage: used sparingly for functional actions such as search, shopping bag, and chevrons

illustration_style.primary: photorealistic device renders with subtle reflections and soft shadows
illustration_style.secondary: soft 3D-like or gradient backgrounds behind hardware to create depth and color contrast
illustration_style.accent: occasional flat or semi-3D illustrations for promotions or abstract technology concepts

scroll_based: sections reveal with a fade-in and slight upward translation as they enter the viewport
hero imagery and background gradients may have gentle parallax where images move at a different rate than text
dark and light bands transition with soft cross-fades rather than abrupt cuts
hover_interactions: cards subtly lift (1–2px translateY negative) and intensify shadows
buttons slightly scale up and darken their background while preserving pill shape
links change color to the primary tone and sometimes display a thin underline
carousel controls (dots or arrows) become more prominent with opacity and scale changes
micro_interactions: spec sliders or variant selectors update price and details with smooth opacity transitions instead of full page reloads
chips and filters animate with quick color fades and subtle background scale when toggled
sticky navigation bar gently changes background opacity or gains a shadow when the page scrolls

animation_feel.easing: mostly cubic-bezier curves approximating ease-out for entrances and ease-in-out for transitions
animation_feel.overall: animations are smooth, understated, and never distract from product content

media_components.hero_media: could transition between still frames or short autoplaying loops with fading cross-dissolves
media_components.product_gallery: image carousels slide horizontally with easing, snapping cleanly to each frame
media_components.interactive_3d: optional tilt or rotation on cursor movement can be simulated for hero hardware models

state_changes.active: elements compress slightly and reduce shadow on press, then bounce back to hover state
state_changes.disabled: reduced opacity and removal of hover/active motion
state_changes.error: inputs or inline messages can gently shake or briefly tint red when validation fails (optional)

layout_changes: multi-column grids collapse into a single column stack on small screens
hero layout reorders so the primary heading appears above the product image on mobile
navigation condenses into a menu button and full-screen overlay menu at small widths
horizontal product rows transform into swipeable carousels with partial next-card peeking
spec comparison tables become vertically stacked sections per product variant with accordions
touch_interactions: carousels support swipe gestures with momentum scrolling
buttons and chips have increased vertical padding for tap targets
hover-only effects are translated into color and elevation changes on tap or focus

tailwind_tokens.spacing_scale: use multiples of 4px (Tailwind 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12) with sections using 16–24 units vertically

component_recipes: build hero modules with a responsive two-column grid at large breakpoints and stacked flex column on small screens
implement cards using bg-surface, rounded-2xl, shadow-xl, and p-6 with hover:shadow-2xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all duration-200

define primary buttons as inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full px-5 py-2.5 text-sm font-medium text-white bg-primary hover:bg-primary-600 focus-visible:outline focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-primary
use motion-safe utilities or custom animation classes to apply fade-in and translate-y transitions on scroll for sections
set page container with mx-auto max-w-5xl px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 to mirror the central column feel
